description:
VaultImpl.deposit(uint256,address) (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#20-27) is dependent on asset.balanceOf(this) to determine deposit/mint credits, enabling share inflation attacks:
	Source: VaultImpl.totalAssets() (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#16-18): 
	- IERC20(asset).balanceOf(address(this)) (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#17)
	Target: VaultImpl.deposit(uint256,address) (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#20-27): 
	- sharesToMint = amount (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#22)
	- sharesToMint = amount * totalSupply / totalAssets() (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#25)
markdown:
[VaultImpl.deposit(uint256,address)](tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#L20-L27) is dependent on asset.balanceOf(this) to determine deposit/mint credits, enabling share inflation attacks:
	Source: [VaultImpl.totalAssets()](tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#L16-L18): 
	- [IERC20(asset).balanceOf(address(this))](tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#L17)
	Target: [VaultImpl.deposit(uint256,address)](tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#L20-L27): 
	- [sharesToMint = amount](tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#L22)
	- [sharesToMint = amount * totalSupply / totalAssets()](tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#L25)

description:
VaultImpl.mint(uint256,address) (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#29-36) is dependent on asset.balanceOf(this) to determine deposit/mint credits, enabling share inflation attacks:
	Source: VaultImpl.totalAssets() (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#16-18):

	Target: VaultImpl.mint(uint256,address) (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#29-36): 
	- tokensDeposited = shares (tests/detectors/share-inflation-erc4626/0.8.0/share-inflation-erc4626.sol#31)
